document_data.name: Greneire
document_data.mainbody: '''Greneire''' was the king of an [[orc]] tribe located in the [[Spine of the World]] mountain range north of [[Dark Arrow Keep]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.History: Some days before [[Midsummer]] in 1367 DR, King Greneire led an army of 150,000 orcs southward and besieged the kingdom of [[Many-Arrows]] at its capital, [[Citadel Felbarr|Citadel of Many Arrows]]. The siege lasted four months and ended in [[Uktar]] of that year when Greneire's forces finally broke through the gates of the citadel, but the battle and the war were lost when King [[Obould]] slew Greneire in single combat. when [[dwarves]] of [[Clan Warcrown]] arrived to rout the survivors.
